pageSetting.title: 行员工资项指标结果查询

attribute.value: select lbdh as key,lbmc as value from csb_hylb

select d.gzxbh as key ,d.gzxmc as value from gztx_gzxdy d where exists(select 1 from GZTX_gzx_sjly s,khfa_fapz p where d.gzxbh=s.gzxbh and instr(rtrim(p.famc),rtrim(s.famctj))>0 and (rtrim(s.FAMCTJ)<>'' or rtrim(s.FAMCTJ) is not null) and p.khdx=2) order by d.px

select.isEqual: select a.khdxdh,$tjrq$ as tjrq,c.jgdh,c.jgmc,b.hydh,b.hymc, d.lbmc as hylb,e.gwmc as hygw, case when khzb.khzbmc is null then zbpz.xmmc else khzb.khzbmc end as khzbmc,a.yyjg,a.yysm, a.gzfamc from jxgz_gzxzbjg_hy a left join khfa_khzb_hy khzb on khzb.khzbdh=a.khzbdh left join khfa_khzbpz zbpz on zbpz.fabh=a.fabh and zbpz.khzbdh=a.khzbdh inner join khdx_hy b on b.khdxdh=a.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy bb on bb.khdxdh=b.khdxdh and a.tjrq between bb.qsrq and bb.jsrq inner join khdx_jg c on c.khdxdh=bb.jgkhdxdh inner join khdx_hylb d on d.khdxdh=b.khdxdh and a.tjrq between d.qsrq and d.jsrq inner join khdx_hygw e on e.khdxdh=b.khdxdh and a.tjrq between e.qsrq and e.jsrq inner join table(fn_getsjjg_java_qxhy($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) hy on hy.khdxdh=b.khdxdh where a.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and d.lbdh='$hylb$' and a.tjrq=$tjrq$ and a.yyzlbh=$yyzl$ and a.gzxbh='$gzxbh$' order by c.jgdh,b.hydh

select a.khdxdh,$tjrq$ as tjrq,c.jgdh,c.jgmc,b.hydh,b.hymc, d.lbmc as hylb,e.gwmc as hygw, case when khzb.khzbmc is null then zbpz.xmmc else khzb.khzbmc end as khzbmc,a.yyjg,a.yysm, a.gzfamc,a.zbqz,a.bdz,a.fdz,a.zbz,a.jhz from jxgz_gzxzbjg_hy a left join khfa_khzb_hy khzb on khzb.khzbdh=a.khzbdh left join khfa_khzbpz zbpz on zbpz.fabh=a.fabh and zbpz.khzbdh=a.khzbdh inner join khdx_hy b on b.khdxdh=a.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy bb on bb.khdxdh=b.khdxdh and a.tjrq between bb.qsrq and bb.jsrq inner join khdx_jg c on c.khdxdh=bb.jgkhdxdh inner join khdx_hylb d on d.khdxdh=b.khdxdh and a.tjrq between d.qsrq and d.jsrq inner join khdx_hygw e on e.khdxdh=b.khdxdh and a.tjrq between e.qsrq and e.jsrq inner join table(fn_getsjjg_java_qxhy($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) hy on hy.khdxdh=b.khdxdh where a.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and d.lbdh='$hylb$' and a.tjrq=$tjrq$ and a.yyzlbh=$yyzl$ and a.gzxbh='$gzxbh$' order by c.jgdh,b.hydh

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select lbdh as key,lbmc as value from csb_hylb

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select d.gzxbh as key ,d.gzxmc as value from gztx_gzxdy d where exists(select 1 from GZTX_gzx_sjly s,khfa_fapz p where d.gzxbh=s.gzxbh and instr(rtrim(p.famc),rtrim(s.famctj))>0 and (rtrim(s.FAMCTJ)<>'' or rtrim(s.FAMCTJ) is not null) and p.khdx=2) order by d.px
